channel.description: Week 3 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 2 Due 7 PM Mon: Week 2 Discussion 11:59 PM Fri: Week 3 Quizzes Next Mon: Lab 3 Next Mon: Week 3 Discussion Lab 2 Grading Canvas Only No Meeting Required Speaker: Dr. Gary Pratt K-State CIO Since 2017 Right Before Hale Library Fire Oversees All K-State IT Big Picture, Long-Range Planning Lab 3 Core Network Services Set IP Addresses Install DNS & DHCP Install SNMP See Hints & Diagrams Ask Questions! Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
